notebook: Lateral reading: is the act of evaluating the credibility of a source by comparing it with other sources.
Cross-referencing involves comparing information from the original source with information from other sources.
Source evaluation: Look to see if someone else has already fact-checked the claim. Go to the original source to understand the trustworthiness of the information.
Time Lines: Truth is always changing. Consider the publication date and whether the information is up-to-date and relevant now.
Dr. Green is using these two potions - Infinity, Blue color, A25, used in beauty products; Lifespring, Pink color, A21, for aiding sleep.
Dr. Green is staying here with his daughter for sabbatical. His daughter's birthday is on 09/05. It seems there is something wrong with his daughter though...
I think I know what had happened. Alina may have insomnia, and Dr. Green developed the cure.
Somehow the villagers think he has the immortality potion. I should go talk to them.

clueList.clueInfo: Villagers are gathering here. Seeing you out, they start to ask you if you have the immortal portion.

clueDetail.Villager&nbsp;A: Why are you coming out of this house? Did you see Dr. Green? Do you have the portion.
clueDetail.Villager&nbsp;B: I mean, it sounds ridiculous, but I would rather believe it, would not you?
clueDetail.Villager&nbsp;C: Hey, can you give us the potion?

hint: Villagers are gathering here. It is them who made the noise I hear. Maybe they will leave after I show them the report.
